thread.title: Justin Bieber Readying 'What Do You Mean?' Remix Featuring Ariana Grande
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber Readying 'What Do You Mean?' Remix Featuring Ariana Grande

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Justin Bieber Readying 'What Do You Mean?' Remix Featuring Ariana Grande
text:
Comments The Canadian singer hints that the remix will arrive when his 'Purpose' album becomes available for pre-order this Friday. 
Justin Bieber has tapped Ariana Grande for the official remix of his latest hit, "What Do You Mean?". The Canadian heatthrob announced the collaboration in a tweet he posted on Wednesday, October 14. "Ok. Preorder Friday. Let's do it. Ok by you @ArianaGrande? #purpose #nov13 #remix #PreOrder," Bieber wrote, apparently hinting that the remix would arrive at the same time his " Purpose " album becomes available for pre-order this Friday, October 16. Responding to Bieber's tweet, Grande coyly asked him, "@justinbieber what do you mean?" @justinbieber what do you mean? — Ariana Grande (@ArianaGrande) October 14, 2015 Bieber's "Purpose" album is scheduled to come out on November 13. Serving as the project's lead single, "What Do You Mean?" debuted atop Billboard Hot 100 following its release back in August, giving the 21-year-old superstar his first-ever No. 1 single on the chart. Bieber isn't the only one currently promoting new music. Grande is now gearing up to drop "Focus" off her upcoming third studio effort, " Moonlight ". Also on Wednesday, she unveiled the single's cover art , which features her rocking brand new platinum blonde hair. 
© AceShowbiz.com
